reason: Removed deprecated `after_bundle` helper inside plugins templates.
Removed deprecated support to `config.ru` that uses the application class as an argument of `run`.
Removed deprecated `environment` argument from the `rails` commands.
Removed deprecated `capify!` method in generators and templates.
Removed deprecated `config.secret_token`.
Passing the Rack server name as a regular argument to `rails server` is deprecated.
Support for using the `HOST` environment variable to specify the server IP is deprecated.
Accessing hashes returned by `config_for` using non-symbol keys is deprecated. Users should access them using symbol keys instead.
The seed database task now runs using the inline Active Job adapter.
Removed `ActionCable.startDebugging()` in favor of `ActionCable.logger.enabled`.
Removed `ActionCable.stopDebugging()` in favor of `ActionCable.logger.enabled`.
Calling `reject_unauthorized_connection` from an `ActionCable::Connection` now closes the connection.
Removed deprecated `fragment_cache_key` helper in favor of `combined_fragment_cache_key`.
Removed deprecated method `#success?` in favor of `#successful?`.
Removed deprecated method `#missing?` in favor of `#not_found?`.
Removed deprecated method `#error?` in favor of `#server_error?`.
Deprecated `ActionDispatch::Http::ParameterFilter` in favor of `ActiveSupport::ParameterFilter`.
Deprecated controller level `force_ssl` in favor of `config.force_ssl`.
Changed `ActionDispatch::Response#content_type` to return the Content-Type header as it is, without modification.
Rails will now raise an `ArgumentError` if a resource param contains a colon.
Removed deprecated `image_alt` helper.
Removed an empty `RecordTagHelper` module from which the functionality was already moved to the `record_tag_helper` gem.
Deprecated `ActionView::Template.finalize_compiled_template_methods` with no replacement.
Deprecated `config.action_view.finalize_compiled_template_methods` with no replacement.
Deprecated calling private model methods from the `options_from_collection_for_select` view helper.
Clear Action View cache in development only on file changes, speeding up development mode.
Only accept formats from registered MIME types.
Deprecated `ActionMailer::Base.receive` in favor of Action Mailbox.
Deprecated `DeliveryJob` in favor of `MailDeliveryJob`.
Deprecated `Parameterized::DeliveryJob` in favor of `MailDeliveryJob`.
Perform the enqueued mail delivery jobs in the `assert_emails` block.
Removed deprecated `#set_state` from the transaction object.
Removed deprecated `#supports_statement_cache?` from the database adapters.
Removed deprecated `#insert_fixtures` from the database adapters.
Removed deprecated `ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::SQLite3Adapter#valid_alter_table_type?`.
Removed support for passing the column name to `sum` when a block is passed.
Removed support for passing the column name to `count` when a block is passed.
Removed support for delegation of missing methods in a relation to Arel.
Removed support for delegating missing methods in a relation to private methods of the class.
Removed support for specifying a timestamp name for `#cache_key`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveRecord::Migrator.migrations_path=`.
Removed deprecated `expand_hash_conditions_for_aggregates`.
Deprecated mismatched case-sensitivity collation comparisons for uniqueness validator.
Deprecated using class level querying methods if the receiver scope has leaked.
Deprecated `config.active_record.sqlite3.represent_boolean_as_integer`.
Deprecated passing `migrations_paths` to `connection.assume_migrated_upto_version`.
Deprecated `ActiveRecord::Result#to_hash` in favor of `ActiveRecord::Result#to_a`.
Deprecated methods in `DatabaseLimits` such as `column_name_length`, `table_name_length`, etc..
Deprecated `update_attributes` and `update_attributes!` in favor of `update` and `update!`.
Deprecated `config.active_storage.queue` in favor of `config.active_storage.queues.analysis` and `config.active_storage.queues.purge`.
Deprecated `ActiveStorage::Downloading` in favor of `ActiveStorage::Blob#open`.
Deprecated using `mini_magick` directly for generating image variants in favor of `image_processing`.
Deprecated `:combine_options` in Active Storage's ImageProcessing transformer without replacement.
Removed deprecated `#acronym_regex` method from `Inflections`.
Removed deprecated `Module#reachable?` method.
Removed `Kernel#` (backtick method) without any replacement.
Deprecated using negative integer arguments for `String#first`.
Deprecated using negative integer arguments for `String#last`.
Deprecated `ActiveSupport::Multibyte::Unicode#downcase` in favor of `String#downcase`.
Deprecated `ActiveSupport::Multibyte::Unicode#upcase` in favor of `String#upcase`.
Deprecated `ActiveSupport::Multibyte::Unicode#swapcase` in favor of `String#swapcase`.
Deprecated `ActiveSupport::Multibyte::Unicode#normalize` in favor of `String#unicode_normalize`.
Deprecated `ActiveSupport::Multibyte::Chars#normalize` in favor of `String#unicode_normalize`.
Deprecated `ActiveSupport::Multibyte::Chars.consumes?` in favor of `String#is_utf8?`.
Deprecated `ActiveSupport::Multibyte::Unicode#pack_graphemes(array)` in favor of `array.flatten.pack("U*")`.
Deprecated `ActiveSupport::Multibyte::Unicode#unpack_graphemes(string)` in favor of `string.scan(/\X/).map(&:codepoints)`.
Removed deprecated `config` in `dbconsole`.
Removed deprecated `Rails.config.action_view.raise_on_missing_translations`.
Removed deprecated `ActionMailer::DeliveryJob` in favor of `ActionMailer::MailDeliveryJob`.
Removed deprecated `ActionMailer::Parameterized::DeliveryJob` in favor of `ActionMailer::MailDeliveryJob`.
Removed deprecated `database` kwarg from `connected_to`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveRecord::Base.allow_unsafe_raw_sql`.
Removed deprecated option `:spec_name` in the `configs_for` method.
Removed deprecated support to YAML load `ActiveRecord::Base` instance in the Rails 4.2 and 4.1 formats.
Removed deprecation warning when `:interval` column is used in PostgreSQL database. Now, interval columns will return `ActiveSupport::Duration` objects instead of strings.
Removed deprecated support to resolve connection using `"primary"` as connection specification name.
Removed deprecated support to quote `ActiveRecord::Base` objects.
Removed deprecated support to type cast to database values `ActiveRecord::Base` objects.
Removed deprecated support to pass a column to `type_cast`.
Removed deprecated `DatabaseConfig#config` method.
Removed deprecated support to search using non-deterministic order.
Removed deprecated `environment` and `name` arguments.
Removed deprecated `Tasks::DatabaseTasks.dump_filename`.
Removed deprecated `Tasks::DatabaseTasks.schema_file`.
Removed deprecated `Tasks::DatabaseTasks.spec`.
Removed deprecated `Tasks::DatabaseTasks.current_config`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveRecord::Connection#allowed_index_name_length`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveRecord::Connection#in_clause_length`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveRecord::DatabaseConfigurations::DatabaseConfig#spec_name`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveRecord::Base.connection_config`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveRecord::Base.arel_attribute`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveRecord::Base.configurations.default_hash`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveRecord::Base.configurations.to_h`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveRecord::Result#map!`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveRecord::Result#collect!`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveRecord::Base#remove_connection`.
Deprecated `Tasks::DatabaseTasks.schema_file_type`.
Removed deprecated enumeration of `ActiveModel::Errors` instances as a Hash.
Removed deprecated `ActiveModel::Errors#to_h`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveModel::Errors#slice!`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveModel::Errors#values`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveModel::Errors#keys`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveModel::Errors#to_xml`.
Removed deprecated support concat errors to `ActiveModel::Errors#messages`.
Removed deprecated support to `clear` errors from `ActiveModel::Errors#messages`.
Removed deprecated support to `delete` errors from `ActiveModel::Errors#messages`.
Removed deprecated support to use `[]=` in `ActiveModel::Errors#messages`.
Removed support to Marshal and YAML load Rails 5.x error format.
Removed support to Marshal load Rails 5.x `ActiveModel::AttributeSet` format.
Removed deprecated `config.active_support.use_sha1_digests`.
Removed deprecated `URI.parser`.
Removed deprecated support to use `Range#include?` to check the inclusion of a value in a date time range.
Removed deprecated `ActiveSupport::Multibyte::Unicode.default_normalization_form`.
Deprecated passing a format to `#to_s` in favor of `#to_fs` in `Array`, `Range`, `Date`, `DateTime`, `Time`, `BigDecimal`, `Float`, and `Integer` to allow for Ruby 3.1 optimization.
Removed deprecated behavior that was not halting `after_enqueue` and `after_perform` callbacks when a previous callback was halted with `throw :abort`.
Removed deprecated `:return_false_on_aborted_enqueue` option.
Deprecated `Rails.config.active_job.skip_after_callbacks_if_terminated`.
Removed deprecated `Rails.application.credentials.action_mailbox.mailgun_api_key`.
Removed deprecated environment variable `MAILGUN_INGRESS_API_KEY`.
Removed deprecated `config.read_encrypted_secrets`.
Removed deprecated support to extend Rails console through `Rails::ConsoleMethods`.
Deprecated requiring `"rails/console/methods"`.
Deprecated modifying `STATS_DIRECTORIES` in favor of `Rails::CodeStatistics.register_directory`.
Deprecated `bin/rake stats` in favor of `bin/rails stats`.
Removed `Rails.application.config.action_controller.allow_deprecated_parameters_hash_equality`.
Deprecated drawing routes with multiple paths to make routing faster.
Removed deprecated support to passing `nil` to the `model:` argument of `form_with`.
Removed deprecated support to passing a content to void tag elements on the `tag` builder.
Removed deprecated `config.active_record.commit_transaction_on_non_local_return`.
Removed deprecated `config.active_record.allow_deprecated_singular_associations_name`.
Removed deprecated support to finding database adapters that aren't registered to Active Record.
Removed deprecated support for defining `enum` with keyword arguments.
Removed deprecated `config.active_record.warn_on_records_fetched_greater_than`.
Removed deprecated `config.active_record.sqlite3_deprecated_warning`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::ConnectionPool#connection`.
Removed deprecated support to passing a database name to `cache_dump_filename`.
Removed deprecated support to setting `ENV["SCHEMA_CACHE"]`.
Deprecate the `retries` option for the `SQLite3Adapter` in favor of `timeout`.
Removed deprecated `ActiveSupport::ProxyObject`.
Removed deprecated support to setting `attr_internal_naming_format` with a `@` prefix.
Removed deprecated support to passing an array of strings to `ActiveSupport::Deprecation#warn`.
Deprecated `Benchmark.ms`.
Deprecated addition and `since` between two `Time` and `ActiveSupport::TimeWithZone`.
Removed deprecated `config.active_job.use_big_decimal_serializer`.
Deprecated `enqueue_after_transaction_commit`.
Deprecated internal `SuckerPunch` adapter in favor of the adapter included with the `sucker_punch` gem.
Removed deprecated `bin/rake stats` command.
Removed deprecated `STATS_DIRECTORIES`.
Removed deprecated support to skipping over leading brackets in parameter names in the parameter parser.
Removed deprecated support for using semicolons as a query string separator.
Removed deprecated support to a route to multiple paths.
Removed deprecated `:retries` option for the SQLite3 adapter.
Removed deprecated `:unsigned_float` column method for MySQL.
Removed deprecated `:unsigned_decimal` column method for MySQL.
Deprecated using an order dependent finder method (e.g. `#first`) without an `order`.
Deprecated `ActiveRecord::Base.signed_id_verifier_secret` in favor of `Rails.application.message_verifiers`.
Deprecated using `insert_all` with unpersisted records in associations.
Deprecated using `upsert_all` with unpersisted records in associations.
Deprecated usage of `WITH`, `WITH RECURSIVE` and `DISTINCT` with `update_all`.
Removed deprecated passing a Time object to `Time#since`.
Removed deprecated `Benchmark.ms` method. It is now defined in the `benchmark` gem.
Removed deprecated addition for `Time` instances with `ActiveSupport::TimeWithZone`.
Removed deprecated support for `to_time` to preserve the system local time. It will now always preserve the receiver timezone.
Deprecated `config.active_support.to_time_preserves_timezone`.
Deprecated `String#mb_chars`.
Deprecated `ActiveSupport::Multibyte::Chars`.
Deprecated `ActiveSupport::Configurable`.
Removed support to set `ActiveJob::Base.enqueue_after_transaction_commit` to `:never`, `:always` and `:default`.
Removed deprecated `Rails.application.config.active_job.enqueue_after_transaction_commit`.
Removed deprecated internal `SuckerPunch` adapter in favor of the adapter included with the `sucker_punch` gem.
Deprecated built-in `sidekiq` adapter (now provided by `sidekiq` gem).
